items.title: Chapman University
items.subtitle: Degrees & Programs Finder
items.intro: This powerful program finder is a multi-faceted, interest-oriented search to help prospective students find the perfect academic program to match their passions and strengths.
items.desc: I developed all of the filtering logic for this search myself, from scratch â€“ no JavaScript libraries or frameworks were used except for jQuery. The programming was complex and had many nuances, but the experience gained along the way made it well worth it. I'm proud to say that this is one of the best examples of my independant, challenge-driven coding style.

items.title: William Jewell College
items.subtitle: Website Redesign
items.desc: This project required development of four faceted searches, of which I coded the logic myself using only JavaScript and jQuery. I created a set of two controllers to power these searches, and wrote them in a way that has made them scalable and reusable for future projects. In addition, the design of the site provided an opportunity for me to explore and code designs that are bold and new to higher education.

items.subtitle: Website Redesign
items.desc: Wonders of Wildlife was developed by our team under an incredibly tight timeline. I worked in tandem with my two fellow front-end developers at BarkleyREI to launch this as quickly as possible while developing the engaging ...

items.title: University of Virginia School of Engineering
items.subtitle: Website Redesign

items.title: Explore Minnesota
items.subtitle: Home Page Redesign & Website Refresh
items.desc:
Explore Minnesota is a long-standing client of BarkleyREI. They recently came to us looking for a full website refresh. We usually start all new projects with a fresh code base, however, Explore Minnesota asked us to work based off of the current site.

Revamping the site within the constraints of the existing markup and functionality was a challenge, but I was pleased to find this meant I was able to use my design background to a significant degree. Time constraints only allowed us to produce designs for a handful of the dozens existing templates, allowing me the creative freedom to fill in the gaps and design as I coded.

items.title: Davidson College
items.subtitle: Interactive Campus Map
items.desc: Developing this interactive map was my first dive into both the Google Maps API and forward/back browser navigation support.
